This incident highlights the potential risks involved when deploying AI for important operational roles in a company without sufficient safeguards.",

title: OpenAI unveils ChatGPT agent to handle tasks as AI apps evolve
content: July 17 (Reuters) - OpenAI launched an artificial intelligence agent for its popular chatbot ChatGPT on Thursday that can complete complex tasks as the Microsoft-backed (MSFT.O), opens new tab startup looks to get ahead of competitors in the AI race. AI agents ‚Äî considered to be an evolution of an assistant ‚Äî have been embraced across the tech world with large firms, including Microsoft, Salesforce (CRM.N), opens new tab and Oracle (ORCL.N), opens new tab, spending billions on the technology to boost productivity and make operations more cost efficient. *   About Reuters, opens new tab *   Reuters News Agency, opens new tab *   Reuters and AI, opens new tab *   Reuters Leadership, opens new tab *   Reuters Diversity Report, opens new tab
